<style>
/* LARGE slideshow container */
.slideshow {
  position: relative;
  width: 900px;    /* large width */
  height: 650px;   /* large height */
  overflow: hidden;
  margin: auto;    /* centers on page */
}

/* Each slide */
.slide {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 900px;
  height: 650px;
  opacity: 0;
  animation: fade 15s infinite;  /* 5 images Ã— 3 seconds = 15 seconds total */
}

/* Large certificate images */
.slide img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: contain;   /* keeps certificate readable */
  background: white;
  padding: 10px;
  border-radius: 8px;
}

/* Animation delays for each slide */
.slide:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0s; }
.slide:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 3s; }
.slide:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 6s; }
.slide:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 9s; }
.slide:nth-child(5) { animation-delay: 12s; }

/* Fade animation */
@keyframes fade {
  0% { opacity: 1; }
  18% { opacity: 1; }
  20% { opacity: 0; }
  100% { opacity: 0; }
}
</style>
